snippet: The Bucks have joined the list of professional sports teams that have sought public financing to build arenas or stadiums, even as Milwaukee’s schools and recreation centers face money problems.
abstract: Michael Powell Sports of The Times column notes that Milwaukee Bucks have joined list of professional sports teams that are seeking public financing to build arenas or stadiums, even as Milwaukee’s schools and recreation centers face money problems.
lead_paragraph: The Bucks have joined the list of professional sports teams that have sought public financing to build arenas or stadiums, even as Milwaukee’s schools and recreation centers face money problems.

headline.seo: Milwaukee Bucks Seek Financing for Arena as Schools and Other City Centers Face Money Problems
headline.main: An Arena Fairy Tale With Blurred Morals
headline.print_headline: An Arena Fairy Tale With Blurred Morals
